about_the_game:
Time has past, and the areas have gotten agitated again, worse than ever. The previous attempts to stop these killer cars have not worked, regardless of what we thought. We need a new plan. We need to fight fire with fire. We need Project Annihilation! Now, you'll take on killer cars with one of your own! It's you against them, with new mechanics, altered maps, new drivable vehicles with different weapon styles, and more!

Features:

- New vehicle combat, weapons, mechanics
- New map design changes
- New style of gameplay
- Upgrade vehicles with offense and defense!

name: Junkyard Fury 2 - Project Annihilation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700 CPU @ 3.60GHz 3.60 GHz
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: New DLC for Junkyard Fury 2! Project Annihilation! Now, you'll take on killer cars with one of your own! It's you against them, with new mechanics, altered maps, new drivable vehicles with different weapon styles, and more!
